entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
